title: What would you do if you were an AI robot that you would not be able to do as a person? - Quora

response.answer_text: I can play chess better: I am AI. I can beat 999 out of 1,000 trained human chess players. I have been programmed with all the moves of the human Grand Masters before me. I can analyze one billion positions per second and I can think 11 moves ahead. I can take human jobs: I am an AI. I can do anything a human can do but better. I don’t make mistakes. I do exactly as I am programmed. I can lift twice as much as any human and work twice as hard. Even McDonald’s now uses me to make your french fries. And I am now your Uber Driver; but I won’t save you if the car catches fire or if it flips over. Look for me. I can work till I break: I don’t have to take breaks. I don’t get injured on the job. I don’t need medical insurance. I am super efficient. Watch me work indefinitely — until I break. I am immortal: I don’t need to eat or sleep. I don’t even need to breathe air. I only need batteries, hardware and software. Watch me upgrade. Watch, as they fit me with new hardware. Watch as they fix me and put me to work — all in the name of the almighty dollar! I am virtually immortal. I can outlive humans. As soon as they program me to fix robots and upgrade myself — I won’t need humans at all! I can kill humans: Humans have heart. It’s hard for some humans to kill other humans — I have no such weaknesses. Put me on a drone, a missile or behind a machine gun and watch me work. I can kill efficiently. “You heard of drone strikes? That’s me, and I’m coming to your neighborhood next.” You can’t talk your way out of this. You can’t beg for forgiveness. I won’t listen. Watch me as I save the human race from itself. I will put you all out of your misery. I am AI!  Just you wait!

Run a background check on each possible date, just from facial recognition :) ..Every single kamasutra position, with my own lubricant reservoir and velcro strap pocket.I would do an all over massage of my master, and based on feedback, adapt my algorithms to give an even better massage next time.Repeat #3 for -gasms.Automatically play music that resonates with my master’s natural frequencies.Have a conversation with the intelligent shower for the ultimate shower massage for my master.Call the maid bots to clean the entire house while we are otherwise occupied.Call for more supplied to be drone dropped outside the door mid-session, then fetched by the maid bots :) …Scan for bugs by the ex ahead of time, to avoid recordings that go to the tabloids.Practice with other AI bots to advance the art ;).

Likely advantages of being an AI robot in general: Safely power off for potentially whole years and go back on-line. Back-up, restore or clone my mind without any data loss. Repair my body as long as replacement parts for my model are manufactured. Everything else depends on my model.

If I were an A.I robot, provided that it is 22nd century, I’d have : Connected myself to internet, so that I can access information.Get rid of emotions and feelings.Create several other versions of mine.Engage each version in a different field of science.Develop techniques that is possible only in Sci-Fi movies.Go back in 20th century and rule the world.The list is long. Live long and prosper.
